rukus.text: Oebbi, ikwen Ixelqen si oehfan; sinna, deffir oehfan, Irra tazmert; sinna, deffir tezmert, Irra oehfan, akked ccib. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Neppa d Amusnaw, d Aeernuk
Ass ideg ara d ijbu yimir, ad gallen ibe$wviyen, ar siwa saaa segmi mmuten. Akka ay skiddiben
Ad inin wid iwumi teppunefk tussna, akked liman: "ni$ teqqimem di Tezmamt n Oebbi, ar ass n tnekra. Wagi d ass n tnekra, maca tellam ur tessinem
Assen, wid idensen, ur ten tepsellik nndama ne$ asuter n ssmae
Ni$ Nefka, i medden, yal amedya di Leqwoan agi. Maca, mi sen d tebbwiv assekni, ad ak inin, war ccekk, wid ijehlen: "kunwi d wid ireoonen
Akka i Iselle$ Oebbi ulawen n wid ur nessin
Eubeo, ih, lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Ur k seirin, wid ur nepputebbet
